results.content:
This course is a basic introduction to powerBI and focusses on introducing the UI with recommendations for the student to investigate the deeper functionality in the exercises.
Would suit anyone unfamiliar with Microsoft products.
The course is structured to take the student through the key processes of BI, from download and installation through importing, transformation, visualisation and publishing.
It could be improved by provided more specific exercises with realistic real world analytic challenges.
The open data sources (e.g. NYC open data) were a revelation to me.

Great course on BI - I enjoyed the course and finally understand the real difference between Power BI Desktop vs BI Online. 

I found this course to be well structured and explained by the instructor.
